meanings.sent1: She seemed unexcited about the upcoming party.
meanings.sent2: The unexcited audience barely clapped at the end of the performance.
meanings.sent3: Even the magician's tricks left her unexcited.
meanings.sent4: The unexcited atmosphere in the room was palpable.
meanings.sent5: His unexcited response to the news surprised everyone.

meanings.sent1: The unexcited cat lazily stretched on the windowsill.
meanings.sent2: The unexcited plant wilted in the dry soil.
meanings.sent3: The unexcited alarm clock failed to wake him up on time.
meanings.sent4: The unexcited computer screen remained blank.
meanings.sent5: His unexcited reaction to the thrilling movie puzzled his friends.

meanings.sent1: She gave an unexcited response to the invitation.
meanings.sent2: The unexcited student yawned during the lecture.
meanings.sent3: His unexcited attitude towards the project was evident.
meanings.sent4: The unexcited book club struggled to finish the assigned novel.
meanings.sent5: The unexcited puppy ignored the new toy.
